name: Smiley Face T-Shirt
description:
BOLD WILL HOLD APPAREL 2013

NEW UNISEX REGULAR FIT T-SHIRT WITH CUSTOM SMILEY FACE DESIGN

Our unisex t-shirts come in regular fit chest sizes and they are made from 100% ring spun jersey cotton. The material is preshrunk for dependable after wash performance, follow wash instructions.

Chest Size
Small 34 - 36
Medium 38 - 40
Large 42 - 44
X-Large 46 - 48
XX-Large 50 - 52

Customer order enquiries: hi@boldwillhold.co.uk

DELIVERY INFORMATION
UK orders will be charged at £3 for Royal Mail shipping and shipping for everywhere else is £8.

Further postage information can be found here:
http://www.boldwillhold.co.uk/delivery
